short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add new revenue from your restaurant content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Receive affiliate revenue for reservations that your audience makes.

Affiliate links are compatible with your existing set-up. Add links to your IG stories, your favorite link in bio tool, or your website.

Features:

Automatic Link Scanning: Instantly finds potential affiliate links, saving you time and effort.

No Broken Links: If a restaurant switches from, say, OpenTable to Resy, we handle that without you needing to update your affiliate link.

Hassle-Free Monetization: Converts standard links into affiliate links effortlessly, streamlining your path to increased revenue
